fields.title: Fields to serialize
fields.description: Required for CSV, ELFF and CLF. All other formats support wildcard field lists. E.g., host, myField, !source *

srcField.title: Source Field
srcField.description: Field containing object to serialize. Leave blank to serialize top level event fields.

cleanFields.title: Clean Fields
cleanFields.description: Whether to clean field names by replacing non-[a-zA-Z0-9] characters with _.

delimChar.title: Delimiter

quoteChar.title: Quote Char
quoteChar.description: Character used to quote literal values.

escapeChar.title: Escape Char
escapeChar.description: Escape character used to escape delimiter or quote character.

nullValue.title: Null Value
nullValue.description: Field value representing the null value. Null fields will be omitted.
